TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UIOption extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies which dialog boxes to show when copying, deleting, or moving files or directories.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This enumeration is used with <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem.CopyDirectory%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem.CopyFile%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem.DeleteDirectory%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem.DeleteFile%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem.MoveDirectory%2A>, and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem.MoveFile%2A> methods.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.UIOption AllDialogs = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Show progress dialog box and any error dialog boxes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.UIOption OnlyErrorDialogs = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Only show error dialog boxes and hide progress dialog boxes. Default.
